profile.title: Profile
profile.text: Here you can delete or edit your current profile.

colorScheme.title: Color Scheme
colorScheme.text: Choose a light or dark color scheme to personalize your experience. You can also select "System" to choose the color scheme for the app based on your operating system settings.

language.title: Language
language.text: Choose your preferred language for the app.

deleteProfile.title: Delete Profile
deleteProfile.text: Delete your current profile. This does not reset any other app settings.
deleteProfile.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?

storage.title: Storage
storage.text: Delete profiles and saved game data to free up storage space.
storage.dangerZoneText: Changes in this area cannot be undone!

modals.confirmDeleteAllProfilesTitle: Are you sure you want to delete all profiles?
modals.confirmDeleteAllMatchesTitle: Are you sure you want to delete all matches?
modals.confirmResetAppTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the app?
modals.confirmResetAppText: This will reset the app to its original state. This can help resolve issues encountered while using the app.

notifications.successDeleteAllProfilesText: All profiles have been successfully deleted!
notifications.successDeleteAllMatchesText: All matches have been successfully deleted!
